Section.Paragraph: This paper studies the impact of paraphrases on the accuracy of automatic evaluation. Given a reference sentence and a machine-generated sentence, we seek to nd a paraphrase of the reference sentence that is closer in wording to the machine output than the original reference.
We apply our paraphrasing method in the context of machine translation evaluation.

Our experiments show that the use of a paraphrased synthetic reference re nes the accuracy of automatic evaluation. We also found a strong connection between the quality of automatic paraphrases as judged by humans and their contribution to automatic evaluation.
